title: Memories of a mate: an interview with Ivor White
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Planning and Community Development, partner

abstract: A poignant story by a WWII veteran of mateship and the psychological damage caused by war.
description: An emotional account by WWII veteran, Ivor White, about his involvement in the war in New Guinea and the tragic circumstances that brought about the death, on 14 July 1944, of his mate Jack Reynolds.
